titleStmt.title: The worlds prospect, or, A commentarie upon the 33 of Isaiah and the 14 vers[e] in these words, The sinners in Sion are afraid in which words are declared how farre the saints may sinne against knowledge and conscience and yet not sinne the sin against the Holy Ghost / delivered and set forth by John Emersone ...
titleStmt.author: Emersone, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.P. for Nicholas Gamage, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
